name: Iffy-huffy
description:
There is no absolute good or evil in the world of young boys. Compared to the prince who fights  to save the princess, they often choose to be the giant, powerful monster. What if we break up the traditional perception of princes and monsters? Let the monster break through the many barriers and the prince is the final boss?

“Iffy Huffy” is an adventure game with a high level of difficulty. Players(little monster) need to avoid predictable and unpredictable dangers, through the designated level, to reach the last level with the boss, which is the prince.

Instruction

  1. Hit “SPACE” twice to double jump and Arrows key to move
  2. Avoid all the obstacles to survive 
  3. Alongside recognizable dangers, there are many less obvious threats as well
  4. Player always dies with a single hit
  5. There are some hints to get to the next level
  6. Read the background texts for more information
